resources.string: Your headset is getting hot. We recommend pausing for a few minutes to allow your headset to cool down.

The cooling fan on your device is not functioning properly. \10\10Your headset may overheat or experience abnormal behavior due to insufficent cooling. \10\10Please contact Oculus Customer Support https://support.oculus.com for assistance.
Your headset temperature is rising and will power off.\10\10To reduce the risk of personal injury, remove your headset and let it cool down before continuing use.
